Question: Shenzhen Mokoc Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Mokoc Technology Co., Ltd

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- Leading provider of advanced imaging solutions
- Developer of laser display technology
- Pioneering innovator in Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) technology
- Showcasing car-integrated and home appliances
- Newly integrated projection curtain in the AITO M9
- Application of ALPD 5.0 super full-color laser technology and other innovations
- Demonstrating new "flying car", the AeroHT
- Utilizing machine learning platforms for e-commerce and advertising
- Showcasing use of generative AI for smart lighting
- Specializing in electronic manufacturing, PCB assembly, and rapid prototyping services
- Complete range of electronic components placement devices and specialized assembly instruments
- Factory equipped with clean room, ESD components control, and testing facilities
- Office covering an area of 1200 square meters
Summary_cn:
深圳市摩凯科技有限公司

产品亮点：CES 2024

- 先进成像解决方案领先供应商
- 激光显示技术开发者
- 光探测与测距（LiDAR）技术的开拓者创新者
- 展示车载和家用电器产品
- AITO M9新增集成投影窗帘
- 应用ALPD 5.0超全彩激光技术等创新
- 展示"飞行汽车"AeroHT
- 利用机器学习平台进行电子商务和广告
- 展示生成式人工智能用于智能照明
- 专注于电子制造、PCB组装和快速样机制作服务
- 提供完整范围的电子器件安装设备和专业组装工具
- 工厂配备洁净室、ESD元件控制和测试设施
- 办公面积为1200平方米
